summary: The diff shows changes in App.tsx that introduce Vite-compatible environment checks (import.meta.env.DEV) and an error/loading fallback UI, but it does not provide clear evidence of the required pre-bundle process.env polyfill. The diff summary also indicates substantial unrelated feature/content additions (job API integrations, marketing/SEO copy, analytics, Stripe/Twilio features), which are outside the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a safe `process.env` polyfill before the React bundle executes so fresh loads do not crash with `ReferenceError: process is not defined`, and ensure `process.env.II_URL` and `process.env.NODE_ENV` exist at runtime (without modifying immutable hook files).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes changes to `frontend/index.html` but the shown excerpt contains only SEO/meta/performance tags; there is no visible inline script (or referenced polyfill) that defines a `process` global and `process.env` before the React bundle runs.
evidence: frontend/index.html (truncated excerpt shows no process/env polyfill)

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the production black screen so the app reliably renders initial UI; console no longer shows a fatal startup exception preventing React from mounting; unexpected runtime errors show an error fallback UI.
missing_requirements.reason: While `frontend/src/App.tsx` adds `ErrorFallback` and `LoadingFallback`, the diff excerpt is truncated and does not clearly show that a top-level error boundary is actually wired to render the fallback (nor does it show the specific startup exception being addressed).
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (truncated; shows fallback components but not full boundary wiring / startup-fix evidence)

hallucinated_features.description: Major SEO/marketing page rewrite (new title/description/keywords/OpenGraph/Twitter meta, new purpose-discovery branding).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal prohibits adding new product features beyond fixing black screen; these changes are unrelated to preventing startup crashes.

hallucinated_features.description: Implementation/claims of live job listings integration using public APIs (JSearch/Adzuna) plus API status alerts and retry mechanisms.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and constitutes new functionality unrelated to the black screen/process.env fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of extensive analytics tracking across multiple marketing platforms (GA4, Facebook Pixel, LinkedIn Insight Tag, Mixpanel).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; represents new marketing/telemetry features outside the bugfix scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Stripe checkout/test mode pricing functionality and payment initiation analytics/test card instructions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; new payment-related functionality beyond black screen fix.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces unrelated integration scope beyond the black screen fix.
